body.content: Buongiorno, Caterina. Always a pleasure to exchange words. I trust your operations at the customs house are thriving amidst these... interesting times. I've been observing the flow of goods myself from my stalls, and it seems certain resources remain stubbornly scarce. Perhaps your unique vantage point offers insights into how a diligent contract broker might assist in smoothing these supply lines, or even uncover new ventures for mutual prosperity? I am always keen to ensure efficiency in our Republic's commerce.
